directions: Place apples in a microwave-safe container; cover and cook in the microwave until tender, about 2 minutes. Add strawberries; cover and cook in the microwave for 1 minute more.
Transfer apples and strawberries to a blender; pulse until smooth and mixture reaches a consistency similar to yogurt or applesauce.
ingredients: 2 apples, cored and sliced into 8 wedges
4 strawberries, quartered, or more to taste
title: Strawberry Apple Baby Food
